text: Arnold Abelinti (born 9 September 1991) is a French Guiananese international footballer who plays as a forward for French side SO Romorantin and the French Guiana national football team. ==Career== Starting his career at Loiret-based side USM Olivet, Abelinti was spotted by then-Championnat National side US Orléans, and spent two seasons with the club's 'B' team, scoring an impressive 16 goals from 30 appearances. He left in 2013, feeling betrayed by the Orléans club and moved to CFA 2 side Saint-Pryvé Saint-Hilaire. He had two spells there, scoring a total of 29 goals in 48 games, with a year at Limoges FC between them. He returned to the CFA in 2016, signing with JA Drancy in July. On 19 June 2019, Abelinti joined SO Romorantin.Football. Le SO Romorantin entame son mercato, lanouvellerepublique.fr, 19 June 2019 ==International career== Abelinti made his debut in June 2016, scoring the second of a 3–0 win against Bermuda. In his second game, against St. Kitts & Nevis, he scored the game's only goal. == Career statistics == === International === {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center" |- !
